metadata.title: CVE-2018-16854 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in moodle versions 3.5 to 3.5.2, 3.4 to 3.4.5, 3.3 to3.3.8, 3.1 to 3.1.14 and earlier. The login form is not protected by atoken to prevent login cross-site request forgery. Fixed versions include3.6, 3.5.3, 3.4.6, 3.3.9 and 3.1.15.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
